name: cisco-talos-feed
label: Cisco Talos Feed
description: Talos Reputation Center provides access to expansive threat data and related information. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of blacklisted IP addresses.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Server URL of the Cisco Talos Feed Security server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Fetch list of blacklist IP indicators feed from the Cisco Talos Threat intelligence.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON).
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON).
